title: im sooo fucking glad Riot released runeglaive, and sated devourer
body:
{{champion:113}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:28}}  Cant ban all these guys anymore while people are abusing the fuck out of them after sated devourer is released which pulls them back and keeps them safe 

and that we need to fucking ban {{champion:11}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:10}}  


hahahaahahaa, this balance team is a fucking joke 

how much cocaine did you snot... before thinking its ok to release these 2 items?.... Did they even fucking listen or read to what people on PBE's opinion about it? but nope they have to release it live

thanks Riot. your a great company
